definition: head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program

sentences.english: All are members of the Proboscidea order of mammals.
sentences.chinese: 以上均是哺乳綱長鼻目的成員。

sentences.english: The mammoth, a ancient elephant, mammalia, long nose item, real elephant faculty.
sentences.chinese: 猛獁象，古脊椎動物，哺乳綱，長鼻目，真象科。

sentences.english: Ground sloths are a diverse group of extinct sloths, in the mammalian superorder Xenarthra.
sentences.chinese: 地懶是已經滅絕的樹懶的一個子類，屬哺乳綱貧齒目。
